snippet: Semester Online, with 10 participating universities, will offer small, for-credit classes that will be open to outside students accepted to the program.
lead_paragraph: Semester Online, with 10 participating universities, will offer small, for-credit classes that will be open to outside students accepted to the program.

headline.seo: 10 Universities to Form Semester Online Consortium
headline.main: University Consortium to Offer Small Online Courses for Credit
headline.print_headline: University Consortium to Offer Small Online Courses for Credit
